author: JeffJrShim#2396
name: OwnerManagement
install_msg:
Thanks for installing. This cog has **high security flaws, use at your own risk.**
BY USING THIS COG, YOU AGREE THAT THE AUTHOR (JeffJrShim#2396) IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANYTHING THAT BREAKS IN YOUR BOT WITH THIS CODE. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK ONCE AGAIN.
This cog allows you to add and remove owners easily, without having to shutdown and boot the bot with flags. Do note that the owners don't persist in restart or shutdowns.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
